profile.title: User Profile.
profile.description: Provide a unique profile name for this data. Typically this is the name of profile you selected in the previous step. Note: It's important the name is unique across all Withings integrations, otherwise data will be mis-labeled and you will have to recreate the integration.

reauth.title: Re-authenticate {profile}
reauth.description: The "{profile}" profile needs to be re-authenticated in order to continue receiving Withings data.

abort.missing_configuration: The Withings integration is not configured. Please follow the documentation.
